entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump You should lead by example and get out there and shop and eat at restaurants, Mr. #president. Greet people. Kiss babies. Let's show the world how brave you are. A silly respiratory virus can't keep you from #livingyourbestlife.

#OpenTheEconomy #StayHome #COVID19 #fridaymorning
